name: The Serpent Prince [DEMO] (BL)
description:
Exchanged for a debt, Momiji must attempt to uncover the mystery surrounding his new husband's desire for revenge against Momiji's own family.

FEATURES :

  • DEMO available (game currently under development)
  • 3 characters with sprites (base spites only. More expressions to come!)
  • 1 main romanceable character (BL)
  • Manga-ish backgrounds with colored sprites
  • CGs (Soon!)
  • Animatic-style sequence 
  • 1,500+ words

Music: n59 by Hirokazu Akiyama

SEs: rain-street-01 from 99SOUNDS

This is my first solo VN game, so there's bound to be a few bugs. Known issues are:

- "Options" will break the demo.

- "Quit" does not work. Just close the game window to end the demo.

- Sounds (both music and effects) cannot be altered at the moment (working on the sliders for them). Please ensure that your system's volume is turned down so the music is not overwhelming.  

Other:

I will be adding in more expressions for the sprites soon. I wanted to submit this to a couple of jams, so had to get it at least playable in that time.
